snippet: Abdel Moneim Aboul Fotouh, who is running for president in Egypt, is a former leader of the Muslim Brotherhood whose campaign is attracting liberal supporters.
abstract: Abdel Moneim Aboul Fotouh, leading challenger to Amr Moussa in Egypt's first bona fide presidential election, is a former leader of the Muslim Brotherhood whose campaign is attracting young Islamists and liberal supporters alike; contest is setting of significant public debates about the scope of government and the application of Islamic law, alongside other issues.
lead_paragraph: Abdel Moneim Aboul Fotouh, who is running for president in Egypt, is a former leader of the Muslim Brotherhood whose campaign is attracting liberal supporters.

headline.seo: Aboul Fotouh Is Unlikely Moderate in Egypt Election
headline.main: Top Challenger in Egypt Vote Is an Islamist, and Moderate
headline.print_headline: Top Challenger In Egypt Vote Is an Islamist, And Moderate
